body_html:
Actually I just realized someone already has a PR to fix this: #13666

To see problem with current solution try

import tensorflow as tf
import numpy as np

tf.reset_default_graph()
sess = tf.Session()
run_options = tf.RunOptions(trace_level=tf.RunOptions.FULL_TRACE,output_partition_graphs=True)
run_metadata = tf.RunMetadata()
sess.run(tf.eye(10).op, options=run_options,run_metadata=run_metadata)
print(run_metadata)

You see a large const node being allocated on the GPU which is a problem because this memory will not be released at the end of sess.run

body:
Actually I just realized someone already has a PR to fix this: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/13666

To see problem with current solution try
```
import tensorflow as tf
import numpy as np

tf.reset_default_graph()
sess = tf.Session()
run_options = tf.RunOptions(trace_level=tf.RunOptions.FULL_TRACE,output_partition_graphs=True)
run_metadata = tf.RunMetadata()
sess.run(tf.eye(10).op, options=run_options,run_metadata=run_metadata)
print(run_metadata)
```

You see a large const node being allocated on the GPU which is a problem because this memory will not be released at the end of `sess.run`
